channel.title: Fab Academy 2015
channel.description: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

item.title: Week 4 updates
item.description:
What I have done:

  • added 4th week assignment.Electronic production
  • added colors to the assignments list to show what I did, I have to do, I will do. I decided yellow color until the assignment is approved and grey color for the ones we still have to do the lesson. The red one is because I already know I haven’t completed the assignment.

TO DO:

  • modify milestones final project
  • complete 3rd week assignment

item.title: Week 3 updates
item.description:
I definitely decided to follow this strategy to update my pages and to help reviewers to track my weekly job. Every thing that I add to the week’s page will be added at the bottom of each week page even if I add it after the deadline of the week. Furthermore, every week page will have a summary at the top. This summary will be a quick way to go to each section I add in the page. Finally, to point out my reviewers on what I really did during the current week, I added a news link in the homepage. The news page is a short list about what I did in that particular week. I also wrote a TO-DO list as a quick memo for what I will have to do.

What I have done:

  • added Antimony installation experience. You can find it at the bottom of the page week 2 assignment
  • some experience with Inkscape vinyl cutter
  • laser cutting experience week 3 assignment

TO DO:

  • modify milestones
  • add files to download

item.title: research about final project
item.description:
Here i’ll write some hints to remember for my final project. I think that my first problem will be having an underwater housing to host the electronics. Reading this link i founded this instructable

I think i have to go in depth with this instructable.

item.title: many things to do..
item.description:
Just few words to underline what i did this week:

  • updated my 1st week job description with more details as my local instructor asked to us
  • added news section in homepage to help to understand what i do every week
  • extra: i also definitely moved from Windows (i was using i virtual machine with linux on it) to Linux (Mint). I had to solve a problem with wifi driver but now it works and i like it!

..and the TO DO list:

  • adding the “milestones” in my Final project
  • 2nd week assignment..
